titleStmt.title: Articles to be enquired of, and answered unto by the church-wardens and sworn-men in the visitation of the Right Worshipful the Arch-Deacon of Bedford, an. Dom. 1667
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Archdeaconry of Bedford.

notesStmt.note: In title, "Bedford" appears to be written in ms.
